prompt: In the secluded heart of an expansive open savanna, a breathtaking scene unfolds as a solitary African elephant, an imposing matriarch, stands protectively over her young calf. The duo is framed against the vibrant backdrop of an acacia-dotted landscape, their massive forms casting elongated shadows in the reddish-brown dust. The scene is captured from a slightly elevated perspective, showcasing the elephant family in the foreground with the endless golden grasslands stretching out towards the horizon in the background. The viewer's gaze is drawn from the elephants to a distant herd of zebras grazing peacefully, a visual thread connecting the diverse tapestry of savanna life. The late afternoon sun bathes the landscape in a warm, golden light, softening the contours of the terrain and imparting a serene, almost mystical quality to the scene. Dappled clouds drift across the azure sky, their shadows dancing over the land, while the gentle rustle of the breeze animates the tall grasses. The color palette is a harmonious blend of earthy browns and greens, complemented by the vivid blue of the sky and the subtle hues of the setting sun. The mood is one of tranquil coexistence, underscored by the graceful majesty of the wildlife in its natural habitat. The photograph captures the raw beauty and intricate details of the scene with stunning clarity, the high-resolution image allowing for appreciation of every wrinkle on the elephants' skin and the texture of the savanna grass. This masterful composition exemplifies the art of wildlife photography, evoking a profound sense of wonder at the enduring rhythms of nature.

description: A solitary African elephant stands protectively over her young calf.
The elephant duo is set against an acacia-dotted savanna landscape.
A distant herd of zebras is visible grazing peacefully in the background.

Are there zebras visible in the background?
